summary: The implementation successfully addresses most requirements. REQ-51 (logo replacement) is fully implemented with the Skills Bazzar logo in the header. REQ-52 (PaymentGateway component) displays all bank details correctly with proper instructions. REQ-53 (payment proof submission form) includes transaction ID and screenshot upload with validation. REQ-54 (Buy Now buttons opening payment modal) is implemented with PaymentModal integration. REQ-55 (backend payment proof storage) is implemented with PaymentProof type, blob storage, and status management. However, the diff is truncated for several files, limiting full verification of all acceptance criteria details.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin payment management features including approve/reject mutations and payment proof filtering by status
hallucinated_features.reason: The PaymentManagement.tsx file includes comprehensive admin functionality for approving, rejecting, and filtering payment proofs by status. These features were not requested in the BuildRequest, which only specified storing payment proofs with 'pending' status and preserving existing admin payment management.

hallucinated_features.description: User dashboard with payment proof statistics including total spent, pending payments count, and approved packages display
hallucinated_features.reason: The DashboardOverview.tsx and MyPackages.tsx files implement detailed statistics and package viewing features that go beyond the basic proof submission requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: ImageModal component for viewing payment screenshots
hallucinated_features.reason: PaymentManagement.tsx references an ImageModal component for viewing screenshots, which was not requested in the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module with PaymentProof type definition
hallucinated_features.reason: A migration.mo file was added with schema definitions, but no migration or data structure changes were explicitly requested.
